title: Stagecoach colorized 1939 (John Wayne, Claire Trevor, John Carradine)

sources.title: Stagecoach colorized 1939 (John Wayne, Claire Trevor, John Carradine)
sources.description: A motley group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo, and learn something about each other in the process. directed by John Ford cast: Claire Trevor as Dallas John Wayne as Ringo Kid Andy Devine as Buck John Carradine as Hatfield Thomas Mitchell as Doc Josiah Boone Louise Platt as Mrs. Lucy Mallory George Bancroft as Marshal Curley Wilcox Donald Meek as Samuel Peacock Berton Churchill as Ellsworth Henry Gatewood Tim Holt as Lt. Blanchard Tom Tyler as Luke Plummer I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
